Articles.Content:
Mig 15

A replica aiming to semplicity and style, so it's not a 100% replica like my others crafts but i still love it.

SPECS:

-parts 39

-weight 6.6 tons

-fuel load 300 lt (800 lt max)

-manouverability very similar to a war thunder jet

-speed 1020 km/h at sea level

aesthetics: look the fuselage and how it ends to the intakes and engine, i think it's really beautifull. I used a ram intake to reproduce the rear of the plane.

> [Javascript is disabled. View full album](//imgur.com/a/qhnT1)

[DOWNLOAD](http://www./download/ocsfd50ik6cq8uz/Mig_15_By_Eorin_1_0.craft)

Remember to rep and comment if you like my crafts ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif)

Incredible detail! I will have to download this.

-Argon

Edit: Tried the craft, it flies as good as it looks. +rep

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-29T00:58:44Z" title="04/29/2015 12:58  AM" data-short="9 yr">April 29, 2015</time> by Argon**

You know, good replica, infact, it reminds me of something...

> 
> One thing i have to give to the "new and improved" Circular Intake,
> [http://i.imgur.com/8ACDMEX.png](http://i.imgur.com/8ACDMEX.png)
> 
> Its rather good for creating MiG-15 lookalikes.

....

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/1uImGIsyhPc?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

Its a joke.

Yeah you know, im totally not able to create my own replicas, so i have to copy from others ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif)

[http://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116043-Hangar-di-Eorin](https://forum.kerbalspaceprogram.com/threads/116043-Hangar-di-Eorin)

Want to play, eorin?

[![screenshot302_zpsky88rjhc.png](http://i1383.photobucket.com/albums/ah315/Yukon0009/screenshot302_zpsky88rjhc.png)](http://s1383.photobucket.com/user/Yukon0009/media/screenshot302_zpsky88rjhc.png.html)

But in all seriousness, your Mig is great. GJ mate.
Wow, that is really nice. My mig-15 is less impressive, but I have a mug-17 and 19 as well.

Really beautiful replica, + rep!

EDIT: Ahah sei italiano anche tu

Cool! the engine design is a nice feature. If you've ever seen a MiG-15 in real life, it's actually tiny. I was at an airshow and they had a ton of planes. An F-4, F-16, F-18, F-14, F9F, A-6, A-7, even a Canberra! And then after the 30 foot F-14 there was this little tiny 15 foot MiG ![:P](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_tongue.gif) It kinda goes both ways though, modern jets are huge when you get up close. You always see the pics and videos of flight deck crew on a carrier barely ducking under the fuselage, but it never really hits you how big they are. The intake on an F-14 is huge, you could fit two adults on top of each other in there. Very cool though Eorin, I love your work!

> 
> Really beautiful replica, + rep!
> EDIT: Ahah sei italiano anche tu

sisi ^^ grazie =) ti aggiungo agli amici

- - - Updated - - -

BTW guys i have a 100% replica of a SU-37 in advanced state of WIP, so maybe tonight i might release it.
